mapper.insert: insert into mate_board (user_id, region_id, age_range_id, title, content, thumbnail, start_date, end_date, recruit_number, gender) values (#{userId}, #{regionId}, #{ageRangeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{recruitNumber}, #{gender, typeHandler = org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler})
